panels.title: L7 Request Rate Cluster Wide (baseline traffic)

targets.expr:
topk(
  50,
  sum by (node, source_namespace, reason) (
    label_replace(
      label_replace(
        rate(hubble_drop_total{job="hubble-metrics"}[5m]),
        "destination_namespace", "unknown",
        "destination_namespace", "^$"
      ),
      "source_namespace", "host",
      "source_namespace", "^$"
    )
  )
)

panels.title: Node + src ns + dst ns + reason + drops/sec (truth table)
